summary: Reliable Legal Secretary with experience maintaining docket systems, tracking deadlines, coordinating depositions, and preparing legal documents such as briefs, motions and subpoenas. Proficient in Microsoft Office suite.

experience.title: Assistant Company Secretary
experience.description: Maintains docket systems, tracks deadlines, coordinates depositions; prepares legal documents such as briefs, motions and subpoenas.

experience.title: Executive Secretarial
experience.description: Provided executive secretarial support; managed high-priority tasks and calendar coordination at Symphony House, Petaling Jaya.

experience.title: Assistant Company Secretary
experience.description: Assisted Company Secretary with statutory secretarial duties; supported corporate administration at Shah Alam office.

experience.title: Practical Student
experience.description: Completed practical student training; engaged in courses and seminars related to corporate administration.
